trans-unit.source: when green flag clicked set [product code v] to [0] set [total 1 v] to [0] set [total 2 v] to [0] set [total v] to [0] ask [Enter a product code:] and wait change [product code v] by (answer) set [index v] to (length of (product code)) repeat until <(index) < [1]> set [total 1 v] to ((total 1) + (letter (index) of (product code))) change [index v] by (-1) set [total 2 v] to ((total 2) + (letter (index) of (product code))) change [index v] by (-1) end set [total v] to ((total 1) + ((total 2) * (3))) if <((total) mod (10)) = [0]> then say [This is a valid product code] else say [This is an invalid product code] end
